title: Interaction in learning (TEFC)
creator_credit: Kismet Films and Robert E. Gilbert
brief_description: Uses classroom situations to point out the different types of social interaction that arise during the school years, and the importance of personal contact in solving conflicts in values and broadening the viewpoints of children, especially those from disadvantaged backgrounds.
